DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to show the compliance rates of the patients to statin treatment and the reasons of non-compliance.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study On Compliance Of Statin Treatment Of Patients With High Blood Cholesterol Levels
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with dyslipidemia and taking or planning to take statin treatment. Patients living in the same city of the study center. o Patients aged 18 years and over. Patients with severe systemic disease Patients with alcohol and drug addiction and/or mental disease Patients nursing or pregnant, or planning to get pregnant during the study
